price: Ó vós que credes! Obedecei a Allah e obedecei ao Mensageiro, e não derrogueis vossas obras.
arabic: ۞ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ أَطِيعُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُواْ ٱلرَّسُولَ وَلَا تُبۡطِلُوٓاْ أَعۡمَٰلَكُمۡ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū aṭīʿū al-laha wa-aṭīʿū al-rasūla walā tub'ṭilū aʿmālakum
